Frequently Asked Questions

Here are some of the most common Questions that we get

Do you hire Non-native english speakers? (Passport not from the US, Ireland, Canada, UK, NZ, Aus, or SA)

What are the requirements to teach in China with a proper work visa?

You must have 3 main things: 1) Bachelors degree in any subject and 2) Clean criminal background 3) Passport from one of the 7 countries and/or degree from one of those countries.

I have no work experience since I just recently finished University - can I still get a job?

Is there support once I come to China or will I be all alone?

What jobs do you have?

Team Leaders

Single point contacts will provide a better experience for you
